overview: Parer's War is the true story of World War II frontline cameraman, Damien Parer, whose work won Australia’s first Oscar.  His desperate efforts to return to the battlefield to capture what he believed was the ‘truth’ of war were thwarted by his own government.  Caught between two worlds, his own personal demons almost cost him the woman he loved.
tagline: The savage truth of battle and the brutal truth of the heart.
title: Parer's War
